summary:
Adds a couple crafting items to Embershard Mine - Tanning Rack and Smelter
Edits the original Transmutation and adds Tranmutation II Spell Book
Adds a single bed in place of a broken floor with a bucket
descriptionHtml:
It never made sense to me that there would be a forge in the middle of the mine, without a smelter, So I added a smelter, and in order to craft items, most times leather and leather strips are used, so I added a tanning rack as well. To brighten the corner of the room with the chopping block, I added another torch in that corner, but attached it to the side of the tanning rack closest to the chopping block.

The location of the bucket in the gap along side the "sleeping" room bugged me, so I turned it into another bedroom, by extending it's length slightly, filling in the gap and dropping a single bed into place.

The spell books - Found in Embershard Mine, on the table near the forge.
Transmute : Vanilla Spell, Changes iron ore into silver ore... then silver ore into gold ore. IF you are trying to make silver items, this is a real pain, cast spell, drop the silver ore, cast spell drop ore... until you have enough silver ore, that you then have to pick up off the floor, or open a container to gather... all in all, a real pain to use...
This mod
Transmute I : Changes Iron Ore into Silver Ore.
Transmute II : Changes Silver Ore into Gold Ore.

I also made the water in the forge room a little deeper, to allow swimming in a few spots. Depending on what mods are used, this can come in handy.
And on a final note, I made the misty fog over the water in the forge room a little thicker.
author: Airianna
